Note: if you would like to archive comments too, you need to install version 0.0.33 and use the --get-comments flag, however you will still have the new yt-dlp fixes and features, but existing tubeup bugs cannot be fixed, unless you do manual work.

items.name: yt-dlp

If a site is not supported, or a useful or crucial piece of metadata, including comments, is missing, create an issue.

items.description: Software used to view, download and stitch satellite images.

items.description: A global map of databases and OSINT sources by applicable location.

items.description: A content change detection and notification service.

items.name: Brave

items.name: Bromite
items.description: Bromite is a Chromium fork with ad blocking and enhanced privacy; take back your browser. Works only on Android.

items.name: Tor Browser

items.description: Fast and Private Web Browser. Get privacy out of the box with Waterfox.

items.name: A1 Website Download
items.description: Download entire websites to disk.

items.name: Cyotek WebCopy
items.description: is a free tool for automatically downloading the content of a website onto your local device.

items.name: HTTrack
items.description: Allows you to download a World Wide Web site from the Internet to a local directory, building recursively all directories, getting HTML, images, and other files from the server to your computer.

items.name: Offliberty
items.description: is a website that lets you access any online content without a permanent Internet connection.

items.name: OffShore.cat
items.description: list of vpns for the privacy conscious

items.name: VPN Comparison by That One Privacy Guy
items.description: is a summary list of top best VPN services.

items.description: a javascript library that allows you to create charts easly

items.description: is a powerful data visualization javascript library.

items.name: jqPlot
items.description: A Versatile and Expandable jQuery Plotting Plugin.

items.description: an open-source JavaScript library for mobile-friendly interactive maps.

items.name: Listify
items.description: Turn a Google spreadsheet into a beautiful, searchable listing in seconds.

items.name: Lucidchart
items.description: the intelligent diagramming application that brings teams together to make better decisions and build the future.

items.name: Nodebox
items.description: a family of tools gives you the leverage to create generative design the way you want.

items.name: Observable
items.description: a modern way to create powerful, performant, polyglot data apps built on open source.

items.name: OpenLayers
items.description: A high-performance, feature-packed library for all your mapping needs.

items.name: Palladio
items.description: Visualize complex historical data with ease.

items.name: Perspective
items.description: interactive data visualization and analytics component, well-suited for large, streaming and static datasets.

items.name: Preceden
items.description: Create a Visual Timeline About Any Topic

items.name: Gephi
items.description: is an open-source graph and network visualization software.

items.name: KeePass Password Safe
items.description: is a free and open-source password manager that uses the most secure encryption algorithms to safegard your passwords.

items.name: Qubes
items.description: a security-focused desktop operating system that aims to provide security through isolation.

items.name: Amass
items.description: The amass tool searches Internet data sources, performs brute force subdomain enumeration, searches web archives, and uses machine learning to generate additional subdomain name guesses. DNS name resolution is performed across many public servers so the authoritative server will see the traffic coming from different locations. Written in Go.

items.name: Columbus Project
items.description: Columbus Project is an advanced subdomain discovery service with fast, powerful and easy to use API.

items.name: Merklemap
items.description: Discover and enumerate all subdomains associated with a website, including those not publicly advertised. Works by ingesting certificate transparency logs.

items.name: VesselFinder
items.description: a FREE AIS vessel tracking web site. VesselFinder displays real time ship positions and marine traffic detected by global AIS network.

items.name: Flightradar24
items.description: Real-time global flight tracking platform useful for aviation OSINT, movement analysis, and aircraft monitoring.

items.name: FlightAware
items.description: Flight tracking and aviation intelligence platform providing live, historical, and predictive flight data.

items.name: aadinternals
items.description: Provides tools and insights for advanced analysis and security testing of Azure Active Directory (AAD) and Microsoft 365.

items.name: ArkhamMirror
items.description: Local-first AI document intelligence with offline RAG, contradiction detection, knowledge graphs, and vision AI table extraction.

items.name: Barcode Reader
items.description: Decode barcodes in C#, VB, Java, C\C++, Delphi, PHP and other languages.

items.name: BeVigil-CLI
items.description: A unified command line interface and python library for using BeVigil OSINT API to search for assets such as subdomains, URLs, applications indexed from mobile applications.

items.name: Cyberbro
items.description: A self-hosted application, available as a Dockerized, for effortless searching and reputation checking of observables. Extracts IoCs from raw input and check their reputation using multiple services.

items.name: CyberGordon
items.description: CyberGordon is a threat intelligence search engine. It leverages 30+ sources.

items.name: CrowdSec
items.description: An open source, free, and collaborative IPS/IDS software written in Go, able to analyze visitor behavior & provide an adapted response to all kinds of attacks.

items.name: Datasploit
items.description: Tool to perform various OSINT techniques on usernames, emails addresses, and domains.

items.name: Discoshell
items.description: A simple discovery script that uses popular tools like subfinder, amass, puredns, alterx, massdns and others

items.name: Dorkgpt
items.description: Artificial intelligence that generates advanced search queries to find specific or hidden information on the internet.

items.name: DuckDuckGo URL scraper
items.description: A simple DuckDuckGo URL scraper.

items.name: FaviconHash
items.description: Generate favicon hashes of a website for use on Shodan, VirusTotal, Censys, ZoomEye or FOFA.

items.name: Find osint tool
items.description: Searches multiple OSINT tools to find information across various sources.

items.name: FOCA
items.description: Tool to find metadata and hidden information in the documents.

items.name: Glit
items.description: Retrieve all mails of users related to a git repository, a git user or a git organization.

items.name: Greynoise
items.description: "Anti-Threat Intelligence" Greynoise characterizes the background noise of the internet, so the user can focus on what is actually important.

items.name: IntelHub
items.description: Browser-based open-source OSINT extension. All analysis runs locally (no servers). Features include text profiler, metadata analyzer, site & archive analysis, reverse image search, crypto/telegram analyzers.

items.name: Hunchly
items.description: Hunchly is a web capture tool designed specifically for online investigations.

items.name: LinkScope Client
items.description: LinkScope Client Github repository.

items.name: LinkScope
items.description: LinkScope is an open source intelligence (OSINT) graphical link analysis tool and automation platform for gathering and connecting information for investigative tasks.

items.name: Maltego
items.description: Maltego is an open source intelligence (OSINT) and graphical link analysis tool for gathering and connecting information for investigative tasks.

items.name: Mozilla HTTP Observatory
items.description: Observatory⁩ enhances web security by analyzing compliance with best security practices.

items.name: OpenRefine
items.description: Free & open source power tool for working with messy data and improving it.

items.name: Orbit
items.description: Draws relationships between crypto wallets with recursive crawling of transaction history.

items.name: OSINT Framework
items.description: Web based framework for OSINT.

items.name: OSINT-Tool
items.description: A browser extension that gives you access to a suite of OSINT utilities (Dehashed, Epieos, Domaintools, Exif data, Reverse image search, etc) directly on any webpage you visit.

items.name: OSINT.SH
items.description: Information Gathering Toolset.

items.name: OsintStalker
items.description: Python script for Facebook and geolocation OSINT.

items.name: Outwit
items.description: Find, grab and organize all kinds of data and media from online sources.

items.name: PGPKeyAnalyser
items.description: Analyse and view the details of a PGP key online without having to download the asc file.

items.name: Photon
items.description: Crawler designed for OSINT

items.name: Pyba
items.description: A browser automation framework which requires low-code to search the web and perform OSINT using DFS and BFS modes, ideal for exploratory tasks.

items.name: pygreynoise
items.description: Greynoise Python Library

items.name: QuickCode
items.description: Python and R data analysis environment.

items.name: Router Passwords
items.description: Online database of default router passwords.

items.name: SerpApi
items.description: Scrapes Google search and 25+ search engines with ease and retruns a raw JSON. Supports 10 API wrappers.

items.name: SerpScan
items.description: Powerful PHP script designed to allow you to leverage the power of dorking straight from the comfort of your command line. Analyzes data from Google, Bing, Yahoo, Yandex, and Badiu.

items.name: Sintelix
items.description: Sintelix is an open source intelligence (OSINT) and graphical link analysis tool for gathering and connecting information for investigative tasks.

items.name: sn0int
items.description: Semi-automatic OSINT framework and package manager.

items.name: SpiderFoot
items.description: SpiderFoot Github repository.

items.name: SpiderFoot
items.description: SpiderFoot is an open source intelligence (OSINT) automation platform with over 200 modules for threat intelligence, attack surface monitoring, security assessments and asset discovery.

items.name: SpiderSuite
items.description: An advance, cross-platform, GUI web security crawler.

items.name: Sub3 Suite
items.description: A research-grade suite of tools for intelligence gathering & target mapping with both active and passive(100+ modules) intelligence gathering capabilities.

items.name: The Harvester
items.description: Gather emails, subdomains, hosts, employee names, open ports and banners from different public sources like search engines, PGP key servers and SHODAN computer database.

items.name: Unfurl
items.description: Unfurl analyzes and breaks down URLs into useful forensic components for digital investigation.

items.name: Zen
items.description: Find email addresses of Github users urls and other data effortlessly

items.name: Threat Actor Usernames Scrape
items.description: A collection of fresh intel and threat actor usernames scraped from various cybercrime sources & forums.

items.name: GitGuardian - Public GitHub Monitoring
items.description: Monitor public GitHub repositories in real time. Detect secrets and sensitive information to prevent hackers from using GitHub as a backdoor to your business.

items.name: OnionScan
items.description: Free and open source tool for investigating the Dark Web. Its main goal is to help researchers and investigators monitor and track Dark Web sites.

items.name: onion-lookup
items.description: Free online service and API for checking the existence of Tor hidden services (.onion address) and retrieving their associated metadata. onion-lookup relies on an private AIL instance to obtain the metadata.

items.name: OTX AlienVault
items.description: Open Threat Exchange is the neighborhood watch of the global intelligence community. It enables private companies, independent security researchers, and government agencies to openly collaborate and share the latest information about emerging threats, attack methods, and malicious actors, promoting greater security across the entire community.

items.name: PhishingSecLists
items.description: This list is to be used with web scanning tools (Gobuster, ffuf, Burp Suite, DirBuster). These lists are specifically tailored and designed for fuzzing phishing, crypto scam landing pages, and other malicious sketch af websites. You can gain vaulable intel on successful hits.

items.name: REScure Threat Intel Feed
items.description: REScure is an independent threat intelligence project which we undertook to enhance our understanding of distributed systems, their integration, the nature of threat intelligence and how to efficiently collect, store, consume, distribute it.

items.name: lol_monitor
items.description: Tool for real-time tracking of LoL (League of Legends) players gaming activities including detection when a user starts or finishes a match with support for email alerts, CSV logging, playtime stats and more

items.name: psn_monitor
items.description: Tool for real-time tracking of Sony Playstation (PSN) players gaming activities including detection when a user gets online/offline or plays games with support for email alerts, CSV logging, playtime stats and more

items.name: steam_monitor
items.description: Tool for real-time tracking of Steam players' gaming activities including detection when a user gets online/offline or plays games with support for email alerts, CSV logging, playtime stats and more

items.name: xbox_monitor
items.description: Tool for real-time tracking of Xbox Live players gaming activities including detection when a user gets online/offline or plays games with support for email alerts, CSV logging, playtime stats and more

items.name: lastfm_monitor
items.description: Tool for real-time tracking of Last.fm users' listening activity including detection when user gets online & offline, pauses or resumes playback, all played songs, its duration, skipped songs, with optional auto-play, email alerts, CSV logging, session stats and more

items.name: spotify_profile_monitor
items.description: Tool for real-time tracking of Spotify users' activities and profile changes, including playlists, with support for email alerts, CSV logging, showing media in the terminal, detection of profile picture changes and more

items.name: spotify_monitor
items.description: Tool for real-time tracking of Spotify friends' listening activity including detection when user gets online & offline, played songs, its duration, skipped songs, with optional auto-play, email alerts, CSV logging, session stats and more
